content: about the pattern everything in this pattern is written for one-sized yarn so feel free to use your favorite yarn + crochet hook sizes english/american terminology level beginner socials we are trying to spread the word about a new board game that we created chicken in the kitchen we decided to reach the community through our art this way we are at least adding some value to the community we might not be successful but we might make a friend or two along the way if you are interested in the progress of the board game we share our design progress on our social media you will also find some of the ideas behind the art toward our board game we would love to see what you ve created as well also more free pattern drops are coming instagram @sourdoughchicken youtube @sourdoughchicken tiktok @sourdoughgames try our game for a free printable version of our family-friendly board game chicken in the kitchen visit chickeninthekitchenthegame com copyright the pattern may not be copied reproduced altered published or distributed in any way feel free to resell finished products with pattern credit to our store or our social media handles is much appreciated
